metadata.title: CVE-2018-16384 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A SQL injection bypass (aka PL1 bypass) exists in OWASP ModSecurity Core Rule Set (owasp-modsecurity-crs) through v3.1.0-rc3 via {`a`b} where a is a special function name (such as "if") and b is the SQL statement to be executed.

criterions.comment: modsecurity-crs package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
